items.sentence: He apologized for his rudeness, but she wouldn\'t forgive him.
Last night was very hot and muggy, so I didn\'t sleep so well.
Tom doesn\'t know whether Mary is younger or older than he is.
I got up earlier than usual in order to catch the first train.
I guess I just realized how stupid I would look if I did that.
I guess I was too busy to notice that Tom was having problems.
I had to stop Tom from making the biggest mistake in his life.
I had trouble deciding which brand of dog food to feed my dog.
No one in their right mind would walk in those woods at night.
Only sixteen percent of the teachers at this school are women.
